title: Student Assistant Interview
Interview Descriptions: If you are a student, easy process to apply. Ask a teacher and he will gladly put you in contact to work as a TA. Most require to have succeeded a class with a B+ in the topic.
Interview Questions: What motivates you to teach this lab / class?

title: Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Polytechnique Montréal (Montreal, QC) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: Nicd people to speak with and always a professor is present which can make you understand their needs better and envision working there with great benefits. They always ask for references and they find a way to make you feel confident
Interview Questions: What type of collegue are you?

title: Postdoctoral Fellow Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Polytechnique Montréal (Montreal, QC) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: write an email with CV, motivation to the professor that you are interested in. The professor might get back to you and ask for a zoom call. it will last for 1 hour and then you will be asked to visit the lab.
Interview Questions: Why are you interesed in doing a post doc?

title: Lab Assistant Interview
Interview Descriptions: Easy interview process. As expected, the person in charge contacted me just a few days after applying for the part-time lab assistant job. The requirements for this job are usually to have completed the class you want to be a lab assistant for with ''B'' grade and to have interests for helping people.
Interview Questions: What is your personnal experience or projects regarding the subject of this class you want to be a lab assistant for?

title: Research Assistant Interview
Interview Descriptions: Through short questions to ask you about the technique in data mining, and how you verify the requirement?  Is anything you learn to get you confidence in this?
Interview Questions: what is the testing technique in computer software?

title: Graduate Student Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Polytechnique Montréal in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: Ce n'est pas vraiment un entretien d'embauche. Après avoir rempli les conditions d'admission, il faut se trouver un directeur de recherche. En fonction du profil et du directeur, on peut être amené à faire quelques tests de compétences : critique d'articles, maîtrise rapide d'outils et de sujets.
Interview Questions: Quelles sont les limites d'une thése de recherche

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Polytechnique Montréal in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: It was mostly technical related to my previous work and had some interesting project discussions. Afterward, the current and future projects of the center were discussed. Finally, my preferred project was asked based on my motivation and interest.
Interview Questions: Different fundamental questions about the subject.

title: Postdoctoral Fellow Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Polytechnique Montréal in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions: it was an interview with the professor directly. All the questions were related to the PhD work and the tools and skills. Also, he asked about the published papers and the ones that are in progress.
Interview Questions: What is the new in your PhD work?

title: Research Associate Interview
Interview Descriptions: Got the in person interview after applying. get the response after couple of weeks. The process was really quick, altogether took 3 weeks. The interview was verbal, no written exam.

title: Auxiliaire De Recherche Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Polytechnique Montréal
Interview Descriptions:
Le processus d'embauche s'est fait de façon plus ou moins automatique. Mon directeur de recherche m'a engagé comme auxiliaire de recherche à temps partiel car je n'ai pas de bourse de recherche pour mes études. Puisque j'étudie à temps plein, je ne peux être engagée qu'a temps-partiel à raison de 20h/semaine. 
Pour quelqu'un qui voudrait se faire embaucher par un professeur à Polytechnique Montréal, il est préférable d'avoir des skills spécifiquement pertinentes en fonction des activités de recherche du professeur; sinon il faut savoir développer une affinité avec le professeur
Interview Questions: Je n'ai pas eu d'entretien d'embauche

title: Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Polytechnique Montréal (Montreal, QC) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: only one interview, face to face. applied directly to the professors and got the interview call. was in English language. and few things to test my French language skills. At the beginning the professor describes about his research work, his collaborators, and the opportunities like connection with the hospitals and companies etc.
Interview Questions: About your previous research projects and publications

title: PhD Student Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Polytechnique Montréal in Nov 2015
Interview Descriptions: I just spoke to my supervisor. She was very helpfull and answered all my questions. As I was the only candidate there was no alternative so she just wanted to see if I was still interested.

title: PhD Interview
Interview Descriptions:
phone interview lasting for 1hr, asked about backgroud, courses, personal interests, projects, awards, etc..

got the positive reply a month later, but it took the secretary 3 more months to complete the procedure

title: PhD Candidate Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Polytechnique Montréal (Montreal, QC) in Nov 2014
Interview Descriptions: we were selected out of a pannel of 10 people, then admitted for skype interview. Each interview lasted 30 min. these questions by reviewing our notes on what the hiring manager is looking for.
Interview Questions:
Can you tell me a little about yourself?
How did you hear about the phd  position?
What do you know about polytechnique?

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Polytechnique Montréal (Montreal, QC) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: First, the prof called me and asked some general questions, then asked me t meet him. We had lunch together talking about research interests and how I can contribute to his research group.
Interview Questions: Where did you get your degrees?

title: Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Polytechnique Montréal (Montreal, QC) in Apr 2014
Interview Descriptions: Went through my Teacher in Master. She was teaching a programming class and needed an assistant. I happened to be available and ready to take on the challenge. She checked my credentials and base on our conversation and my undergrad grades, she was convinced that I was the appropriate candidate.
Interview Questions: Needed to ensure that I have teaching abilities

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Polytechnique Montréal (Montreal, QC) in Apr 2013
Interview Descriptions: First I contacted a grad student who had a project, talked with him to know if I was interested in the work. After this, I told him my qualifications and the last step is to do the actual interview with the grad student, which will become your supervisor and the laboratory directors. They want to make sure you'll be able to do bilingual presentations and that you have a little idea of what the project will be and what kind of work it entails. It's a sure hire if you made it to the interview.
Interview Questions: If I had done any kind of programming work before, like the one I was about to do.

title: Master Student Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Polytechnique Montréal (Montreal, QC) in Jun 2012
Interview Descriptions: the interview was passing so great and peaceful the doctor was so friendly he asked me about by experience my preference  my expectation my dream in life and the intention in doing research
Interview Questions: what type of project you prefer?
